    • Constructor Detail

      • Terminal

        public Terminal(int columns,
                int rows,
                int color,
                double scanLineBreadth,
                double fontThickness,
                double verticalCurvature,
                double horizontalCurvature)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize OpenGL, the resources, and go fullscreen.
        Parameters:
        columns - Horizontal character count.
        rows - Vertical character count.
        color - RGB font color. Example: 0x70fe80
        scanLineBreadth - The CRT screen is constructed of vertical scan lines. This parameter tells their breadth or thickness. 1 = no spaces in between. Example value: 0.7d
        fontThickness - This parameter tells how much should the scan lines overreach the pixels of the characters. 0 = stay inside the pixels. Example value: 0.25d
        verticalCurvature - Vertical curvature of the CRT screen.
        horizontalCurvature - Horizontal curvature of the CRT screen.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions contain error texts.

        Returns the LWJGL GLFW Window ID, which can be used for calling LWJGL/GLFW functions.
